author: La Wana - Macon, GA
title: La Wana - Macon, GA
text:
When i inquired with my last carrier about a act of a vandalism in my apartment with my possessions. All the years i have been with them i find my renters insurance did not cover vandalism. After getting over the frustration and disappointment i was so grateful to find your web site while surfing internet. The agent i spoke with Shanetta Harris was so pleasant to speak with, professional, timely, and she was the absolute best to work with in getting my issue resolved, finding a new carrier that cover vandalism also. I love ðŸ’˜ the fact that she find me an even better carrier and at a price rate that fit my budget.
Thank you Shanetta and SelectQuote: Auto & Home Services. Look forward to continued business with the services your company offer.
